translated: The Jātaka🔽The Group of Fives🔽The Chapter of the Unfortunate
The Jātaka of the Doubter of Virtue
virtue is unsurpassed in the world;
See the snake of terrible poison,
he is not killed because of his virtue.”
The Jātaka of the Doubter of Virtue, the sixth.
